section.name: Fixed defects
section.jql: project = MPRT and issuetype = Bug and resolutiondate > 2013-07-09

section.name: New functionality
section.jql: project = MPRT and issuetype in (Story, Improvement, "Technical Story") and resolutiondate > 2013-07-09

section.name: Known Issues
section.jql: project = MPRT and issuetype = Bug and status not in(Closed, Resolved, "Ready for UAT")
